Tibia.Objects.SpellList

Tibia.Objects.SpellList Class Reference

A list of spells. Usage: create a new SpellList object and use it to find a certain spell (say, from user input). Or, add this list to a list box. More...

List< Spell > FindSpells (Constants.SpellType spellType)
 Find all the spells of a given spell type.
List< Spell > FindSpells (uint requiredMana)
 Find all the spells with required mana less than or equivalent to a given mana amount.

Detailed Description

A list of spells. Usage: create a new SpellList object and use it to find a certain spell (say, from user input). Or, add this list to a list box.

bool  wholeWord

Find a spell by its name or words.

Parameters:

wholeWord if true, function only returns a spell whose words match exactly those in spellNameOrWords, if false, it returns a partial match as well
